back_cards.example_en: She tried a sample of the new tea.
This painting is a sample of her art.
The lab analyzed a water sample.
The store handed out free samples.
He submitted a sample of his code.
She’s involved in the charity event.
He’s involved with a new partner.
The math problem was too involved.
They were involved in the decision.
She felt involved in the story.
The book is inside the bag.
It’s cool inside the building.
She’s inside the planning committee.
He felt calm inside his heart.
The puppy stayed inside the crate.
The crowd was mostly locals.
It’s mostly clear today.
He mostly works from home.
The menu is mostly vegetarian.
They mostly agreed with her.
The path led through the woods.
She followed a path to success.
The path to the lake was scenic.
His path took him to teaching.
Life’s path is full of surprises.
He was concerned about the deadline.
She’s concerned with animal welfare.
The teacher was concerned for the student.
This law is concerned with safety.
They’re concerned about the park.
He ate an apple for a snack.
She baked an apple pie.
An apple a day is good advice.
He owns an Apple laptop.
The kids picked apples from the tree.
She conducted the choir with grace.
They conducted a safety check.
He conducted himself with dignity.
She conducted the workshop smoothly.
This metal conducts heat well.
Many worship their god daily.
The statue honored a god.
He was seen as a god in music.
Gods appear in ancient myths.
God, that view is stunning.
The trip was a wonderful experience.
She gave a wonderful presentation.
The garden looks wonderful in spring.
This is a wonderful recipe.
His talent is simply wonderful.
She studied in the library all evening.
His library has many classics.
The library is great for focus.
The library hosts story time.
The online library offers e-books.
He was sent to prison for robbery.
The old fort was once a prison.
She felt trapped in a mental prison.
The prison offers job training.
The story explored life in prison.
There’s a hole in my jacket.
The mouse hid in a hole.
The plan had a big hole.
He lived in a hole of a room.
The ball landed near the hole.
Her attempt at painting was great.
His attempt to climb failed.
The shot was a good attempt.
The attempt to fix it worked.
It was an attempt to start over.
He completed the report early.
She completed her collection.
They completed the course.
We completed the renovation.
She completed her dream run.
The code protected the secret.
She debugged the code for hours.
The team follows a strict code.
Morse code was used long ago.
The book contained a clever code.
Sales rose during the holidays.
She joined the sales team.
The company reported strong sales.
The sales drew big crowds.
Sales reflect the store’s growth.
He gave her a gift for her birthday.
Her gift for music is incredible.
The meal was a gift from a friend.
The gift was beautifully wrapped.
The necklace was a thoughtful gift.
She refused to accept the offer.
He refused the extra work.
They refused entry to the event.
I refuse to trust that rumor.
She refused the help politely.
They increased the team’s budget.
Her savings increased this year.
He increased his study time.
The store increased its hours.
She increased her running speed.
